constraints.name: sequence_ordering
constraints.description: 任务必须按顺序完成，即只有在前一个任务完成后，下一个任务才能激活。
constraints.formal: For all i, quest a_i can only be completed after quest a_{i-1} is completed.

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每次操作后手牌数量保持不变，即每次从手牌中选择一张卡牌放置到牌堆底部，并从牌堆顶部抽取一张卡牌。
constraints.formal: After each turn, the hand size remains n.

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 每个任务只能在其激活后通过播放指定的卡牌来完成。
constraints.formal: Quest a_i can only be completed by playing card a_i after it becomes active.

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 策略的选择依赖于当前可观测的历史信息，相同的已知信息会确定性地导致相同的选择。
constraints.formal: The card chosen at each turn depends only on the observable history and identical known information deterministically yields the same chosen card.
